alert.note: Alert for Sacramento; Solano (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued July 19 at 1:53AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...AMBER Alert... The following message is transmitted at the request of CA California Highway Patrol. AN AMBER ALERT IS BEING ISSUED BY THE CALIFORNIA HIGHWAY PATROL ON BEHALF OF THE VALLEJO POLICE DEPARTMENT. ON JULY 18... 2023... AT 7 45 PM... MANUEL CASTANEDA WAS ABDUCTED FROM VALLEJO... CALIFORNIA. MANUEL CASTANEDA IS A 7 YEAR OLD HISPANIC MALE. SECOND VICTIM... MIGUEL CASTANEDA IS A 5 YEAR OLD HISPANIC MALE. MIGUEL CASTANEDA IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING A CHRISTMAS SHIRT... BLACK BASKETBALL SHORTS AND BLACK SHOES. THIRD VICTIM... FRANCISCO CASTANEDA... IS A 4 YEAR OLD HISPANIC... MALE. FRANCISCO CASTANEDA IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING A BLUE SHIRT... BLUE RIPPED JEANS AND BROWN SHOES. THE SUSPECT... DAMIEN CASTANEDA IS A 34 YEARS OLD... HISPANIC MALE... STANDING 5 FEET 11 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 240 POUNDS. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN DRIVING A CONVERTIBLE WHITE FORD MUSTANG WITH A BLACK TOP... WITH CALIFORNIA LICENSE PLATE NUMBER 7 Z K L 9 4 6. IF SEEN CALL 9 1 1
